PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05832021-06-17,  ,  ,  DFO,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCoastal Fisheries Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Coastal Fisheries Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the COASTAL FISHERIES PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide Canadian protection officers with clear authority to board foreign fishing vessels in the Western and Central Pacific Fisheries Commission (WCPCFC) Regulatory Area and the North Pacific Fisheries Commission (NPFC) Convention Area, and allowing them to exercise the enforcement powers required to engage actively and fully as inspectors in accordance with the WCPFC and NPFC boarding and inspection procedures; and (2) enable Canada and partner states to more effectively plan monitoring, control, and surveillance activities in the WCPFC Regulatory Area and NPFC Convention Area.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0141 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
